item.description:
Everything you need grows in your backyard, you just need to look in the right places. Launched in spring 2008, buyCTgrown.com connects you with local farms and local food so you can enjoy some of the best and most delicious things about Connecticut. buyCTgrown.com

 

The Edgewood Park Market is every  Sunday from 10am-2pm

Location: Edgewood Park, corner of Whalley and West Rock Avenues.

Dates: May 5 – December 22
Day & Hours: Sundays, 10:00am – 2:00pm

Bus: B line.

Not everything there will be vegan but if you are looking for local vegetables this is a great place to support CT farmers.

group.name: The New Haven Vegan Meetup Group

item.name: Edgewood Park Farmers Market
